title: Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell, Neoprene Coated, Various Sets and Weights available
descriptions:
Title: Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell Set, 10 lb Each, Neoprene Coated, Navy Blue, Hexagon, Nonslip

Overview:
Elevate your home workouts with the Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell set. Each dumbbell weighs 10 pounds and features a durable neoprene coating in navy blue for a comfortable, nonslip hold. The hexagon shape prevents rolling for safer floor placement and stay-in-place storage. Ideal for exercise and strength training routines, this set offers long-lasting performance and easy identification with printed weight numbers and color-coding.

Key Features:
- Set of two 10 lb dumbbells (20 lb total)
- Neoprene-coated for a comfortable, nonslip grip
- Navy blue color with color-coding for quick selection
- Hexagon ends prevent rolling for safe, stable storage
- Printed weight number on end caps for easy identification
- Multiple sizes available to grow with your fitness routine
- Designed for exercise and strength training
- Durable construction for long-lasting use

What’s Included:
- 2 x 10 lb Amazon Basics Easy Grip Dumbbells (Navy Blue)

Why You’ll Love It:
- Secure hold: Nonslip grip helps maintain control during reps.
- Floor-friendly: Hex design stays put between sets.
- Easy organization: Color-coding and printed weights speed up sorting.
- Versatile: Great for curls, presses, lunges, rows, rehab work, and more.

Specifications:
- Weight per dumbbell: 10 pounds
- Quantity: 2
- Coating: Neoprene
- Color: Navy Blue
- Shape: Hexagon
- Grip type: Nonslip
- Weight ID: Printed number on end cap
- Sizes available: Multiple

Perfect For:
- Home gyms, apartment workouts, fitness classes, strength training circuits, and anyone seeking reliable, easy-to-grip dumbbells that won’t roll away.
